entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023
